## OlpCopyrightProviderParams interface

\[\[OlpCopyrightProvider\]\] initialization parameters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface OlpCopyrightProviderParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [baseScheme](./harp-olp-utils.olpcopyrightproviderparams.basescheme.md) | string | Scheme to retrieve copyrights from.  <code>&quot;normal&quot;</code> |
|  [environment](./harp-olp-utils.olpcopyrightproviderparams.environment.md) | EnvironmentName | The name of environment. If omitted, environment from catalog HRN will be used. |

|  [layer](./harp-olp-utils.olpcopyrightproviderparams.layer.md) | string | Layer name.  <code>&quot;copyright&quot;</code> |
|  [partition](./harp-olp-utils.olpcopyrightproviderparams.partition.md) | string | Partition name with copyright coverage data.  <code>&quot;copyright_suppliers_here&quot;</code> |
|  [version](./harp-olp-utils.olpcopyrightproviderparams.version.md) | number | Version of the catalog |
